narrative.title: Xiii Corps - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: British Infantry Corps deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain with defensive escarpments. Rocky desert terrain provides good defensive positions. Minefields extensive.
